sentence.Network_en: This Palaestra served as a gymnasium and a place indoctrinate the young people in Augustan ideals.
sentence.Network_cn: 建造它的目的是为了给青年人灌输奥古斯都的理念提供一个场所.

sentence.Network_en: Maybe 5 minites we got the destination, this is the front view of the palaestra.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约5分钟之后我们到达了目的地, 这是体育场的正面.

derivation.yuyuan_name: via Latin from Greek palaistra, from palaiein 'wrestle'

means.word_mean: 1. a public place in ancient Greece or Rome devoted to the training of wrestlers and other athletes
